Hellplague/ Malice:
 
Hellplague looked over her shoulder at Blacknightmare as she came around.  
"Hurry and get up!  I can't hold him forever!" she whispered back to her sister.
 
Malice was almost ready.  Drawing on an old memory, from where eluded him, he was powering up a massive stun attack.  Powerful enough to knock them out cold for a long while.  Malice regained his grin, which made Hellplague worry just a little.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Black Nightmare:


The femme moaned and sat down  she was trying to remember what had 
happenedafter she attaked Malice.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
>  
> Malice snickered.  One down.  Now he focused on Hellplague.
> "Your sister didn't do much.  Think you can do better, Master?"
> He powered up, and prepared for a much more powerful attack.
>  
> Hellplague fll back and knelt next to her felled sister.  She took 
a few feathers, and then stood infront of her.
> "You think she's taken care of, eh?  Are you sure?" she said, with 
a sly grin.
> Malice lost his grin and focused on powering up his attack.
